eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A SHELTER IN PLACE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Clay, MN; AT 11:27 AM ON NOV 19, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:27 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The MOORHEAD POLICE DEPARTMENT is asking you to to shelter in place due to an incident they are dealing with in the area of 18th avenue and 20th street south in Moorhead. Lock your door, find an interior room and stay away from windows and exterior doors. Updates to follow.
